item.title: Testing how to use some container vulnerabilities scanners with Azure Pipelines
item.description: Just show me the code As always if you don’t care about the post I have upload the source code on my Github. A big part of any organization’s risk assessment process is to be aware of and gain visibility into vulnerabilities in the software being used. Vulnerability scanning allows us to review the security state of the container images and take actions to fix issues identified during the scan, resulting in more secure deployments.
